page.title: 20CONCLUSION
page.content: Here concludes our brief survey of the D Block.We have tried to give a general picture of this territory at the junction of conurbation and countryside, whilst at the same time recording the local history and the current concerns of the communities dotted around the edge-Horwich, Blackrod and Adlington.The reservoir, the motorway and the country park, holding the centre ground,have also claimed attention. The data was collected by pupils at St. Catherine's School,Blackrod Church School,Anderton County Primary School and Rivington and Blackrod High.
